about_the_game:
The original version of Welcome To... Chichester 3.

This was originally going to be released, before No Regrets and NightFall was written. Once these two were published, the original WTC 3 episode was no longer relevant to the series

It is playable (except for the female routine), and there are graphics missing

Source code has been included
detailed_description:
The original version of Welcome To... Chichester 3.

This was originally going to be released, before No Regrets and NightFall was written. Once these two were published, the original WTC 3 episode was no longer relevant to the series

It is playable (except for the female routine), and there are graphics missing

Source code has been included

fullgame.name: Welcome To... Chichester 3 : Plenty Of Time To Live

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo or later
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 or later
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible

  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
